Holy Virility: The Social Construction of Masculinity bụ akwụkwọ 1981 nke ya bù Emmanuel Reynaud dere.

E bipụtara ya na France dịka La Sainte Virilité.
Reynaud na-akpọ ndị mmadụ ka ha lụọ ọgụ maka mmezu onwe onye iji nweere onwe ya.
Ọ na-ekwu na njikọ nke ike n'inwe mmekọahụ nwoke na nwanyị gbochiri ụmụ mmadụ ịnụ ụtọ inwe agụụ.
